attributes.action: Have one Womens only carriage on the tube after 8pm
attributes.additional_details: I am creating a QR code for women to use if they feel unsafe getting home after a night out or after a date. I would like to extend this and create womens only carriages on the tube. The government HAS to do more to help women feel safer and be safe travelling around london and these small steps will make a huge change and could save lives
attributes.background: I want the Mayor of London and TFL to make every tube have a womens only carriage in the evenings to help keep women safe when travelling home.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
